about_the_game:
◆ Speed x Skill Card Battle!

The rules are simple: play cards from your hand that connect to the numbers on the playing field.
But to seize victory, you need to observe your opponent closely.
Do you play quickly? Chain many cards at once? or even daringly wait and see?
Consider both your and your opponent's cards at hand, the skills available, the direction of the playing field and unleash the perfect strategy!
Play online against the world or with your dear friend! PS: don't break your friendship! ;)

◆ The key to winning are: Skills

You can utilize up to two skills in a single deck. But your timing and how you use them makes all the difference.
There are skills that give your opponent a hard time and skills that give you the upper advantage. Even skills unique to your chosen character.
With skills that activates when special condition of the playing fields is met, depending on your command, comebacks are possible!

◆ Display unthinkable twist with: Abilities

Differing to skills, your deck will have cards with special effects called "ability".
Which card gets which ability is determined randomly at the start of the battle, so the strategy from your previous game might not always fit your next.
Acknowledge the tides of the playing field and rely on flexibility and adaptation.

◆ To attain greater power get on: Deck Building

To get stronger; to win more satisfying victories, obsess and take great detail of your deck.
A deck specialized in dealing multiple cards at once. A deck that overpowers in late-game. Synergize with your chosen character's playstyle and pursue the thrill of battle using the deck of your own creation.

◇ Speedus continues to Evolve! ◇

The foundational gameplay is provided for free,
However our development team doesn't consider this the final version.
Future updates is in the works, and we will continue to evolve Speedus!

・Overall graphical improvements
・Additional DLC and more!

To do this, all we ask is for you, the players, to enjoy the game.
Please invite your friends and let's play Speedus online!!

short_description: "SPEEDUS" is a competitive card battle game based on the classic card game "Speed." Quickly play cards from your hand that follow the numbers on the field! Use skills and abilities! The first player to play all cards from their deck and hand wins!
